Title: The Blind Banker
Writer: Mark Gatiss (creator), Steven Moffat (creator), Steve Thompson, Arthur Conan Doyle (based on the works of)
Actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Una Stubbs, Zoe Telford
Plot: Mysterious symbols and murders are showing up all over London, leading Sherlock and John to a secret Chinese crime syndicate called Black Lotus.
